/wiki/Araku_(ST)_(Lok_Sabha_constituency: The seven Assembly segments of Araku Lok Sabha constituency are:
/wiki/Srikakulam_(Lok_Sabha_constituency: Srikakulam Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments.
/wiki/Vizianagaram_(Lok_Sabha_constituen: Vizianagaram Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. As per the Delimitation of Parliamentary and Assembly Constituencies Order (2008), it was formed with seven assembly segments.
/wiki/Visakhapatnam_(Lok_Sabha_constitue: Visakhapatnam Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Visakhapatnam district.
/wiki/Anakapalli_(Lok_Sabha_constituency: Anakapalli Lok Sabha constituency comprises the following Legislative Assembly segments:
/wiki/Kakinada_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Kakinada Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to East Godavari district.
/wiki/Amalapuram_(Lok_Sabha_constituency: Amalapuram (SC) Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to East Godavari district.
/wiki/Rajahmundry_(Lok_Sabha_constituenc: Rajahmundry Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to West Godavari district.
/wiki/Narasapuram_(Lok_Sabha_constituenc: Narasapuram Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to West Godavari district.
/wiki/Eluru_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Eluru Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to West Godavari district.
/wiki/Machilipatnam_(Lok_Sabha_constitue: Machilipatnam (Lok Sabha constituency) is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Krishna district.
/wiki/Vijayawada_(Lok_Sabha_constituency: Vijayawada (Lok Sabha constituency) is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises eight assembly segments and belongs to Krishna district.
/wiki/Guntur_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Guntur (Lok Sabha constituency) is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Guntur district. It was constituted in 1989 and N.G.Ranga was the first member of parliament from the constituency and the present being Galla Jayadev , who won the 2014 lok sabha election representing Telugu Desam Party.
/wiki/Narasaraopet_(Lok_Sabha_constituen: Narasaraopet Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Guntur district.
/wiki/Bapatla_(SC)_(Lok_Sabha_constituen: Bapatla Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Guntur and Prakasam districts.
/wiki/Ongole_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Ongole loka Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Prakasam district. Magunta Sreenivasulu Reddy(YSRCP) won the seat in 2019 elections. INC won 11 times, CPI won 1time, TDP won 2 times, Independents won 1 times , YSRCP won 2 times.
/wiki/Nandyal_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Nandyal Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Kurnool district.
/wiki/Kurnool_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Kurnool Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Kurnool district.
/wiki/Anantapur_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Anantapur Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Anantapur district.
/wiki/Hindupur_(Lok_Sabha_constituency): Hindupur Lok Sabha constituency is one of the twenty-five lok sabha constituencies of Andhra Pradesh in India. It comprises seven assembly segments and belongs to Anantapur district.
